name: Potion Energy

effect.text: If you play this card from your hand, remove 1 damage counter from the Pok√©mon you attach it to, if it has any. Potion Energy provides [C] energy. (Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.)

tips: Heals 10 damage when played from hand
Minor healing but doesn't cost your Trainer for turn
Better than regular Energy when your Pokemon is damaged

competitiveHistory: Potion Energy was the healing counterpart to Full Heal Energy. While removing just 1 damage counter (10 damage) was minor, it provided incremental value without using your Supporter or Item for the turn. It saw occasional play in slower, tankier decks.

rulings.ruling: The healing effect only triggers when you play this card from your hand. Moving it doesn't heal.
If the Pokemon has no damage counters, you still attach the Energy but don't heal anything.
Potion Energy only provides 1 Colorless Energy.
